docs.lead_paragraph: Two Texas environmental groups filed a lawsuit on Thursday under the U.S. Clean Air Act alleging repeated pollution violations by a Houston-area refinery owned by Brazil's national oil company, Petrobras, the organizations said.

headline.print_headline: Texas Environmentalists Sue Houston-Area Refinery Over Pollution
headline.main: Texas Environmentalists Sue Houston-Area Refinery Over Pollution

docs.snippet: Two Texas environmental groups filed a lawsuit on Thursday under the U.S. Clean Air Act alleging repeated pollution violations by a Houston-area refinery owned by Brazil's national oil company, Petrobras, the organizations said....

docs.lead_paragraph: The unexpected departure of the boss of Capita highlights the challenges facing Britain's biggest outsourcing companies as the government tightens the screw on businesses that provide vital public services.

docs.lead_paragraph: The company planning to build a high-speed train system linking Las Vegas and Southern California says the rail would attract 11 million round-trip riders by full buildout in 2035.

headline.print_headline: Report: Vegas-To-Palmdale Rail to Attract 3 Million Riders

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N. mediator at Syria peace talks in Geneva has handed all the delegations a paper with 12 principles that would be the basis for a second round of negotiations, said the head of the "Moscow Platform" political grouping at the talks.

headline.print_headline: U.N. Syria Talks End With Paper on 12 Principles, Delegate Says

docs.lead_paragraph: The Swiss National Bank sees increasing political risks around the world but has the tools it needs to deal with their potential impact on the "significantly overvalued" Swiss franc, Chairman Thomas Jordan told newspaper Schweiz am Wochenende.

headline.print_headline: Swiss National Bank's Jordan Sees Rising Political Risks-Media
headline.main: Swiss National Bank's Jordan Sees Rising Political Risks-Media

docs.lead_paragraph: The Chinese investors due to buy Italian storied soccer club AC Milan said on Friday that they remained committed to the deal and that the delays in the closing were out of their control.

headline.main: Chinese Investors Committed to AC Milan Deal Despite Delay
